summary.span: 用于将环境感知表达式转换为活动树的转换 API。

span.span: A transformation API used to convert environment aware expressions to an activity tree.

summary.span: 将工作流环境感知表达式转换为活动树。

span.span: Converts a workflow environment-aware expression to an activity tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 的代码示例，请参见 。For a code example of , see . 中的转换方法设计为可以使用在工作流内部定义以及通过参数传入工作流的变量和常量。The conversion methods in are designed to work with variables and constants defined inside the workflow, or passed into the workflow via arguments.
